c74object.name: jit.gradient.ui
c74object.description: The jit.gradient.ui object provides a handy GUI for creating and manipulating 4-plane 1-dimensional gradient matrices. Functionality is similar to the jit.gradient object.

method.name: alpha_last
method.digest: Set which plane contains the alpha values (default = 0)
method.description: The word alpha_last, followed by a zero or 1, sets which plane in the matrix contains the alpha values (default = 0). When alpha_last is disabled (set to 0). the output format is ARGB. When alpha_last is enabled (set to 1). the output format is RGBA.

method.name: bang
method.description: A bang message will cause the object to send the current gradient matrix out the object's outlet.

method.name: clear
method.digest: Clear all colors but the first
method.description: The word clear will clear all colors from the matrix except for the first (index 0).

method.name: move_pointer
method.description: The word move_pointer, followed by an integer which specifies the pointer index and a floating-point number in the range 0. - 1.0 will position the pointer index along the range of the gradient.

method.name: output_matrix_dim
method.description: The word output_matrix_dim, followed by an integer, specifies the dimension (size) of the gradient matrix. The size is related to the gradient resolution of the output matrix; a smaller size will result in a gradient with fewer shades.

method.name: pointer_color
method.description: The word pointer_color, followed by an integer which specifies the pointer index and four floating-point numbers in the range 0. - 1.0 sets the color for a pointer index along the range of the gradient.
